faqs.question: What makes The.RAM.PLC different from other verification companies?
faqs.answer: Our AI-first approach and pan-African presence set us apart, enabling faster, more accurate verifications across multiple countries.

faqs.question: How long does the verification process take?
faqs.answer: Most verifications are completed within 24-48 hours, though this can vary depending on the type of verification and institution response times.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with The.RAM.PLC?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We employ enterprise-grade security measures and comply with all relevant data protection regulations to ensure your information remains confidential and secure.

faqs.question: Do you offer services outside of Kenya?
faqs.answer: Yes, we operate across multiple African countries. Please contact us for specific country availability and services.

faqs.question: Can I integrate your verification services with my existing HR systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer API integration options to seamlessly connect our verification services with your existing HR or business systems.

faqs.question: What documents are needed for a tourist visa?
faqs.answer:
Valid passport (6+ months validity)

Completed visa application form

Passport-sized photos

Proof of travel (flight itinerary)

Hotel bookings or invitation letter

Bank statements (proof of funds)

faqs.question: How do I apply for a work visa?
faqs.answer:
To apply for a work visa:

- Get a job offer from an employer in the destination country.

- Ensure the employer sponsors your visa (if required).

- Submit documents like contract, qualifications, and passport.

faqs.question: How long does visa processing take?
faqs.answer:
Processing times vary:

- Tourist visas: 5–15 business days

- Work/Student visas: 2–8 weeks

Express processing may be available for extra fees.

Check the embassy website for exact timelines.

faqs.question: Can I extend my visa?
faqs.answer:
Some visas can be extended. You’ll need to:

- Apply before the current visa expires.

- Provide a valid reason (e.g., medical, work extension).

- Pay extension fees.

faqs.question: How do I check my visa status?
faqs.answer:
You can check your status:

- Online via The RAM PLC embassy/consulate’s tracking portal.

- Using your application reference number.

- By contacting the visa center directly.

Share your country, and I’ll guide you further!

faqs.question: How do I create an account on The RAM PLC?
faqs.answer:
Follow these steps:

- Go to The RAM PLC website (insert link).

- Click "Sign Up" or "Register".

- Fill in your details (Name, Email, Company, etc.).

- Verify your email via the confirmation link sent.

- Log in with your credentials.

Follow-up Options:

- Didn’t receive the verification email? → Check spam or request a new link.

- Need help with company registration? → Contact admin@ramplc.com.

faqs.question: How do I upload files to The RAM PLC?
faqs.answer:
To upload files:

- Log in to your account.

- Navigate to "Upload Files" (Dashboard > Uploads).

- Click "Browse" or drag & drop files.

- Select file type (e.g., Project Docs, Reports).

- Click "Submit".

Supported Formats:

- Documents: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX

- Images: JPG, PNG, TIFF

- CAD/Design: DWG, STEP, STL

Troubleshooting:

- "File too large?" → Compress or split files.

- "Upload failed?" → Check format/size or try again later.

faqs.question: Why can’t I upload my file?
faqs.answer:
Possible reasons:

❌ File too large (Max size: 50MB).

❌ Unsupported format (Check allowed formats above).

❌ No permissions → Contact your admin.

faqs.question: How do I delete/replace an uploaded file?
faqs.answer:
Go to "My Files".

Click the 🗑️ (Delete) or 🔄 (Replace) button.

Confirm the action.

faqs.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faqs.answer:
Click "Forgot Password?" on the login page.

Enter your registered email.

Click the reset link in the email.

Set a new password.

Still stuck? Email support@ramplc.com
